title: 820-2915b stuck in S5 on charger S0 with battery
message:
I have a board that only goes to S0 state when both the charger and battery is plugged in

PPBUS_G3H voltage with only the charger plugged in is 12.5V and drops to 11.7V when the battery is plugged in.

when only plugged into the charger it reaches S5 state
when the battery is connected and then plugged in it turns on.

anyone had a similar issue?

title: 820-2915b stuck in S5 on charger S0 with battery
message: You are not using a REAL ORIGINAL 85W charger.
